author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CATEGORY 5 ERIN PASSING NORTH OF THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS... ...OUTER RAINBANDS AFFECTING THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS...
summary: ...CATEGORY 5 ERIN PASSING NORTH OF THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS... ...OUTER RAINBANDS AFFECTING THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS... As of 2:00 PM AST Sat Aug 16 the center of Erin was located near 19.8, -63.3 with movement W at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 915 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 160 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Erin (AT5/AL052025)
